titles: A briefe & necessary instruction verye needefull to bee knowen of all housholders, whereby they maye the better teach and instruct their families in such points of Christian religion as is most meete. Not onely of them throughly to be vnderstood, but also requisite to be learned by hart of all suche as shall bee admitted vnto the Lordes Supper.
author: Dering, Edward, 1540?-1576.
More, John, d. 1592.
notes: Preface of first part is signed: "E. D.", i.e. Edward Dering.  A revision by Dering of an unpublished work by John More.

The 2nd part with heading "A short instruction very necessary for all suche as shall be receiued to the Lordes supper" is anonymous; the first question of catechism reads "What is the chiefest dutie of a Christian man in this lyfe?"--STC.
More's name appears only in STC 6717--STC.
Signatures: A B⁶ ² B C⁶.
